banner.title: Title 1
banner.subTitle: We are happy to tell you more about Kausar & Associates limited and our skilled team!

title: Service Title
description: We are a dedicated team of professionals who are specialized in Income Tax Consultancy. RevenueAid has a highly experienced tax consultancy team dedicated to providing the best complete taxation solution to its corporate and individual clients. We have a great track record of providing a wide range of taxation services and our record of winning complicated taxation litigation is one of the best in Bangladesh. Many clients include both local and international service firms who approached us for our services after other law firms failed to satisfy their needs.

Our approach to all our clients is very simple we try to comprehend our clients business and demands and work closely to deliver specifically designed taxation services that ultimately fulfill our clients demands. Our years of practice helped us gather an enormous amount of experience in this sector which ultimately aid us in selecting the best course of action for our clients.
